trans-unit.source: Imports standard transport binding elements from [Web Services Description Language](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96160) (WSDL) documents with attached policy expressions.
trans-unit.target: Importa os elementos de associação de transporte padrão dos documentos em [linguagem WSDL](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96160) com expressões de política anexadas.

trans-unit.source: The `TransportBindingElementImporter` type is an implementation of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyImportExtension> interfaces.
trans-unit.target: O `TransportBindingElementImporter` tipo é uma implementação de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension> e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyImportExtension> interfaces.

trans-unit.source: It imports the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpsTransportBindingElement>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeTransportBindingElement>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqTransportBindingElement>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerTransportBindingElement> instances from WSDL service metadata.
trans-unit.target: Importa o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpsTransportBindingElement>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.NamedPipeTransportBindingElement>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqTransportBindingElement>, e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.PeerTransportBindingElement> metadados de serviço de instâncias do WSDL.

trans-unit.source: When these <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement> types are imported, the `TransportBindingElementImporter` type also imports the addressing information from the WSDL metadata.
trans-unit.target: Quando esses <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement> tipos são importados, o `TransportBindingElementImporter` tipo também importa as informações de endereçamento dos metadados WSDL.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElementImporter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElementImporter" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter" /> that performs the import.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter" /> que executa a importação.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext" /> for the contract binding element.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.PolicyConversionContext" /> do elemento de associação atual.

trans-unit.source: Imports a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement" /> instance from the policy attached to the WSDL binding.
trans-unit.target: Importa uma instância <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement" /> da política anexada à associação WSDL.

trans-unit.source: The collection of WSDL documents that are to be imported.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de documentos WSDL que serão importados.

trans-unit.source: The collection of XML Schema documents that are to be imported.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de esquema XML que serão importados.

trans-unit.source: The collection of policy assertions that are to be imported.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de declarações de política que serão importadas.

trans-unit.source: Adds custom policy assertions to the WSDL bindings in WSDL documents that are to be imported.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona declarações de política personalizadas às associações WSDL em documentos WSDL que serão importados.

trans-unit.source: This method attaches a policy expression to WSDL bindings that already have attached policies.
trans-unit.target: Esse método anexa uma expressão de diretiva para associações de WSDL que já anexados políticas.

trans-unit.source: The added policy expression contains a custom policy assertion that contains the SOAP transport URI from the SOAP binding.
trans-unit.target: A expressão de política adicionada contém uma declaração de política personalizada que contém o URI de transporte SOAP da associação SOAP.

trans-unit.source: This policy assertion is used when importing the endpoint to import the correct transport binding element.
trans-unit.target: Esta declaração de política é usada ao importar o ponto de extremidade para importar o elemento de associação de transporte correto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter" /> that performs the import.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter" /> que executa a importação.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext" /> for the contract binding element.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlContractConversionContext" /> do elemento de associação atual.

trans-unit.source: This method does nothing.
trans-unit.target: Esse método não faz nada.

trans-unit.source: This method is implemented as part of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension> interface and does not contain any functionality.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é implementado como parte do <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension> de interface e não contém nenhuma funcionalidade.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter" /> that performs the import.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter" /> que executa a importação.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext" /> for the contract binding element.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlEndpointConversionContext" /> do elemento de associação atual.

trans-unit.source: Imports addressing information from the WSDL port and imports an <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement" /> or an <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpsTransportBindingElement" /> from the SOAP transport URI if a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement" /> is not already imported from policy attached to the WSDL.
trans-unit.target: Importa as informações de endereçamento da porta WSDL e importa um <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpTransportBindingElement" /> ou um <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.HttpsTransportBindingElement" /> do URI de transporte do protocolo SOAP, se um <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement" /> já não tiver sido importado da política anexada ao WSDL.

trans-unit.source: This method does not import addressing information attached to the WSDL if the imported binding contains a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement> that is not imported by this type.
trans-unit.target: Esse método não importa informações de endereçamento anexadas ao WSDL se a associação importada contém um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement> que não é importado por este tipo.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="context" />.Endpoint.Binding is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="context" /> .Endpoint.Binding é <see langword="null" />.
